          <title>
            <string language="et">Kes? Mis? Arvuti kasutamine, 1. klassile</string>
            <string language="en">What and Who</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was und wer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce qui et qui</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que e quem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa e chi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι και ποιοι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Qué y quién</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">Õpilase tööleht I kooliastme 1. klassile. Sõnaliigid: nimisõna. Kas eluta või elus? Arvuti: õppida klaviatuuril trükkimist, lohistamist.</string>
            <string language="en">Student worksheet for the 1st stage of study, form 1. Parts of speech: a noun. Alive or not? Computer: learn typing and dragging.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="et">Algõpetus</string>
            <string language="et">Eesti keel</string>
            <string language="et">sõnaliigid</string>
            <string language="en">Basic School</string>
            <string language="en">Estonian language</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmerbogen für das 1. Stadium der 
Studie, Formular 1. Wortklassen: ein Gegenstandswort. 
Lebendig oder nicht? Computer: erlernen Sie das 
Schreiben und das Schleppen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau d'étudiant pour la 1ère étape de 
l'étude, forme 1. Parties du discours : un nom. 
Vivant ou pas ? Ordinateur : apprenez taper et 
traîner.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha do estudante para o 1o estágio do estudo, 
formulário 1. Partes do discurso: um substantivo. 
Vivo ou não? Computador: aprenda datilografar e 
arrastar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro dell'allievo per la prima fase 
dello studio, forma 1. Parti del discorso: un nome. 
Vivo oppure no? Calcolatore: impari digitare e 
trascinarsi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το φύλλο εργασίας σπουδαστών για το 1$ο στάδιο της 
μελέτης, διαμορφώνει τα μέρη του λόγου 1.: ένα ουσιαστικό.
Ζωντανός ή όχι; Υπολογιστής: μάθετε τη 
δακτυλογράφηση και το σύρσιμο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hoja de trabajo del estudiante para la 1ra etapa 
del estudio, forma 1. Partes del discurso: un sustantivo. 
¿Vivo o no? Ordenador: aprenda pulsar y la 
fricción.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegende Schule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Estnische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">École de base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Langage estonien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escola Básica</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingua estone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
